OrgName: PureWorks, Inc. dba UL Workplace Health and Safety
activities: UL Workplace Health and Safety uses personal information regarding its clients’ personnel to (1) provide occupational health management and training resources, including management of clients’ data, including employee information, as it relates to occupational health management, training and workplace education programs; (2) host clients’ employee information as it relates to training and workplace education programs; and (3) operate, develop and improve UL Workplace Health and Safety’s services and products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Education & Training - (EDS)Information Services - (INF)Health Care Services - (HCS)
recoursemech: For non-HR data, UL Workplace Health and Safety will cooperate with the Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services (“JAMS”) in accordance with the expedited rules of JAMS. For HR data only, UL Workplace Health and Safety will cooperate with EEA data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
